subtitle: If you enjoy this channel, you will know that we have covered many things up to now - not
just Astral projection... but also: the ego, suffering, meditation, dreams, consciousness
and unconsciousness, explanations that go beyond intellectual quantifiable information
and among all of this, beyond all of this, there is something at the basis of it all,
at the primal creative life force of it all, which is: sexual energy ~ if sexual energy
has such a foundational significance to all this, then why is it so commonly overlooked
in spiritual topics? when clearly sexual energy has a grip over us on a collective and personal
level and not just on a human level but also in the world of plants, animals, nature and
the cosmos itself is imbued with sex, or sex energy, even a supernova can be seen as an
explosion of life force or prana and sex is at the grip of our culture too; just look
at every pop song or movie there's always love, lust or sex surrounding it... from the
moment we are born through the vagina, to seeking the right sexual partner for happiness,
to becoming passionate in many different ways we are born through sex and it is through
sex again that we can become born again spiritually,- this art and science is called sexual transmutation,
a lot of you already have some knowledge about this but for those who don't bear with me,
we will talk about this and how it applies to the spiritual path, I have intentionally
put off talking about this here for a long time because i really want to communicate
this in an effective way for everyone to understand because clearly the deeper a topic is the
much more easily it is to misjudge misunderstand and misinterpret it and so this episode is
intended to be more like a lecture so take notes meditate and try to understand what
will be discussed here today, and if you have any questions afterwards please do ask below
as i'm sure many of you will have a lot of questions about this interesting and deep
topic, at the basic understanding of sexual transmutation we can understand it as that:
we can save sexual energy and it can then be harnessed and redirected and the longer
we retain and sublimate sexual energy we can experience massive increases in overall energy
levels; we become more energetic beings this ultimately gives more power to our energy
body too so i.e our etheric and astral bodies and not just that but it energizes your physical
life as well giving you more energy to look after your family better, tend to your business,
clean the house, cook, read, exercise, meditate and even astral project all in the same day
- and with energy to spare; that's how much this spiritual principle can affect the quality
of your life when integrated in an effective and mindful way, this practice is actually
one of the main reasons i can stay so productive in my own personal life, i would personally
doubt my abilities if i didn't practice this and so there's an aspect of energy and manifestation
here too which you should be able to contemplate as a general basis of understanding throughout
this episode... there is a sort of building up of, and condensing of, bioelectrical currents
that run through the manifestation faculties of our being, that's just one way you could
put it, now don't worry i'm going to get more specific as to what sexual transmutation actually
is and entails and how to do it as well so i'll be discussing this throughout the video
but for those who are just slightly interested in this might be annoyed at how long the video
will probably be but i'm going to trust that the ones who are actually serious about this
will stick with me throughout the whole thing in order to get all the information, this
is a tremendous and mature discipline and not something i want you to misunderstand,
just as there are tons of common mistakes made in astral projection there are even more
in this topic of sexual transmutation.
Firstly, a quick shout out to Raine, Samson, Asaf, Bullwey, Navare, Michelle who all became
Patreons - thank you all for joining, if you'd like to support the channel too for just a
few dollars please feel free; you'll get access to our Astral Doorway Discord group where

I also want to mention that Amazon has given me the option to sell hardback versions of

Amazon... so to get back to the topic: In reality, to deeply understand this topic of
sexual energy and transmutation properly requires many hours of study and many months and years
of practice, this practice is not for the light-hearted, if you are not interested or
serious about this topic and you think it sounds stupid and you're convinced that purifying
and conserving our sexuality has nothing to do with the path of spiritual realization
then simply don't listen to this episode - I understand this information will be challenging
for many but at the same time there are many who have been waiting and anticipating for

amazing results just as many around the world are experiencing too, millions in fact since
this topic has become highly popularized online recently, so my attempt here to give you a
summary of the significance and power of sexual transmutation will probably end up being one
of my longer videos, but still, this is really not even long enough for me to cover all basis,
so if you want me to expand on another video on something more specific just let me know
in the comments below, for some of you you will already be practicing this, i've already
had a lot of questions from you regarding this and how i feel about it and what i do,
for example the NoFap community has become quite popular recently i'll leave a link below
if you want to see that but just be warned it's a bit of a frenzy because it's a public
forum but i think it's a good resource to see examples of how the destructive application
of sexual energy can essentially ruin lives, there's almost one million members there so
there's a lot to read and just be mindful that not everyone is exactly clued up on the
most effective methods, and for others this may be the first time you're hearing about
this if you end up falling in love with this then i have some highly recommended reading
for you in the description below, there are also some videos and articles in there too
but my biggest recommendations are the books by Mantak Chia and the tantra section on the
AYP website and also check out the free PDF called Brahmacharya by Swami Sivananda ~ let's
get one thing straight: what we are going to talk about here is not sexual abstinence
or the repression or suppression of sexual energy like a priest or nun right... that's
dangerous and i do not recommend it actually the more sexual power you have, the better,
because it means you have more potential to work with; sex energy is creative energy and
it will build up and must be used it can either be used like an ordinary person or it can

it means to honor, respect, cleanse, and cultivate and channel this energy in a superior way
compared to our usual animalistic behaviors such as most famously: watching pornography
and masturbation, now for those of you reacting to that let's not be judgmental or start to
feel guilty or doubt ourselves morally or ethically or think we're sinners or something,
this is beyond all of that let's instead seek to understand, now at the same time this does
not mean that we don't engage in sex - I still have sex with my partner but something is
fundamentally different i don't experience the orgasm in other words i don't ejaculate
and this is one of the core principles of this practice now at first you may think what's
the fun in that right but actually there is much more fun, in other words, there is more
bliss and happiness that comes from it so more on this as we continue ~ keep in mind
that this sexual principle is something that most people either love or hate those are
the initial reactions, you have to love this practice in order to succeed with it, it is
a serious, mature and devotional practice i was first introduced to it by my Gnostic
teacher about eight years ago i struggled for years with it, and finally it's been over
five years now that i've been consistently and successfully practicing it, and it has
changed every aspect of my life, relationships and my spiritual experiences in profound ways,
now please note that by absolutely no means should you rationalize or believe that you
must do this in order to astral project, remember astral projection is accessible to us no matter
how good or bad or pure or impure a person is, spirituality is not good or evil what
is good or evil is what the individual makes of it, regardless the spirit and the ability

act as a tremendous boost toward your efforts, astral projection in reality requires a lot
of spiritual energy and saving sexual energy generates enormous amounts of energy and invigorates

sexual topic was actually originally taught in many spiritual groups and secret societies
throughout history, from certain older sects of buddhism to early alchemists to freemasons

knowledge would usually not be revealed to members until months or years of being a member

i've left a free PDF in the description below on this, so even though for many centuries,
until this age of information, it was always considered one of the best kept secrets of

is being spread into the public and hence why we're seeing this ancient tantric practice
so frequently discussed openly in spiritual communities which is great but also tricky
in terms of helping people integrate this appropriately and with proper guidance...
so to understand what sexual energy is, we also have to understand the human being and
its different kind of minds, and on the surface we have our intellectual center our thoughts
we also have our emotions and then most powerful of all we have our sexual center... what is
felt most intensely in the body?
thoughts, emotions or sexuality?
clearly our sexual center is what is most often a more powerful driving force for not

is needed now let's get more specific - an important and core part of this practice involves

well there is so much to cover and what i've said up to now really just is touching on

~~ "HAMMMM -- SA" ~~
just from that one little cycle i can already feel the energy moving in my body so what

okay but it's really up to you ~ the most important parts over the actual pronunciation

you see how the inhale is longer than the exhale?
that's important - you see we usually breathe the wrong way; our exhale is usually longer

and do HAM
